posting_body: ['►', 'BROCKTON', '- Two Rooms Small Attic', 'STUDIO', 'on 3rd floor', 'Located on the quite side street', '☼', '►Rent - $925.00', '+', 'Utilities', '(Utilities are', 'NOT', 'included)', '☼', '►Suitable for one person only!!!', '☼', '►Available Now!', '►For more information please call', '781>408>9280', 'Small two rooms', 'STUDIO Attic Apartment', 'Maximum', 'Full size bed', 'could be placed in.', 'Eat-in kitchen (place a table), with a closet.', 'Bedroom w/closet and carpet   \t floors.', 'Bathroom with shower stall.', 'Bedroom with closet and carpet     floor.', 'Building  is clean and very quit, occupied by  working residents.', 'Non-smoking environment.!!!', 'Off street parking available', 'Located off Pleasant St. on   Oakland Ave. in nice neighborhood near park.', 'There is bus line on Pleasant St.', 'About 15 min.', 'walk to Westgate   mall and commuter train.', 'Ride to Boston takes about    35-40 minutes.', 'References and rental history checked.', 'Good rental history required.', 'Pets are', 'not', 'allowed.', 'One year minimum stay.', 'First and last months and security deposit required to move in.', 'Please call Joshua 781>408>9280', '►No Brokers Please!', '►', 'No Texting Please', '!', '►', 'NO EMAILS, Please CALL 781*408*9280', '!', '*', '►', 'Please read this ad again, check the map and directions and then...', 'call (781) 408-9280 for more information and to see this apartment', '*►For Location- please see the map above.', '*►For Directions-- click on the Google link below the map.', 'PLEASE READ THIS AD AGAIN, CHECK THE MAP AND DIRECTIONS, AND THEN...', 'Phone calls only - call >781*408*9280 for more information and to see this apartment']
